mapper.insert: insert into member (member_no, member_id, member_name, member_pw, email, phone) values (member_no.nextval, #{memberId}, #{memberName}, #{memberPw}, #{email}, #{phone})
mapper.delete: delete from member where member_id = #{memberId} and member_pw = #{memberPw}
mapper.insert: insert into member_dog (dog_no, member_no, dog_breed, dog_birthday, dog_name) values (dog_no.nextval, #{memberNo}, #{dogBreed}, #{dogBirthDay}, #{dogName})
